Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Laramie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Laramie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
